title: Union Berlin install Steffen Baumgart as new head coach | Bundesliga
snippet: Union Berlin have turned to their former forward and captain Steffen Baumgart to lead the club into the New Year following the dismissal of Bo Svensson.

title: Steffen Baumgart - Wikipedia
snippet: In December 2024, he was named the new head coach of Union Berlin.
